Create Clusters for BEAST2 Input

create_BEAST2_clusters.Rd

Using SNP cluster information and DNA sequences, separate sequences into separate DNAbin objcts by cluster. If desired, keep only SNPs.

Usage

create_BEAST2_clusters(
  seqs,
  cluster_assignments,
  min_cluster_size = 4,
  min_varsites = 8,
  snps_only = TRUE,
  constant_sites = "",
  cluster_dictionary_file = NULL,
  fasta_dir = NULL
)

Arguments

seqs

A matrix of DNA sequences, where rownames correspond to sample IDs, or an ape::DNAbin object.

cluster_assignments

A data frame of cluster assignments, including at least sample_id and cluster_name, as output by assign_snp_clusters. Must also include collectdt if writing a cluster dictionary.

min_cluster_size

The number of samples required to keep a cluster. If the cluster is too small, discard it.

min_varsites

The number of variable sites required to keep a cluster. If there aren't enough variable sites, discard the cluster.

snps_only

If TRUE, keep only SNPs in the output DNAbin objects.

constant_sites

A string of constant sites to add to the beginning of each sequence. This is necessary for BEAST2 input if using only SNPs. Defaults to an empty string.

cluster_dictionary_file

Optionally, a file path to write a cluster dictionary to, containing cluster names, sizes, and varsites.

fasta_dir

Optionally, a directory to write FASTA files to for each cluster. FASTA files are automatically named after the cluster names.

Value

A named list of matrices containing SNPs.
